alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 2:50PM CDT until July 21 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Scott County in western Arkansas... Northwestern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 250 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Oden, or 17 miles southeast of Waldron, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Scott and northwestern Montgomery Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
